title: Jtag Calendar v3.70 (Joomla 2.5 - 3.x)
description:
JTAG calendar is an elegant, feature- rich events Calendar for Joomla with an attractive , flexible interface.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Schedule Events (one-time / recurring/ all-day)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Set Reminder Email or SMS Alerts
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Set up Multiple Calendars for different teams
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Allow site visitors to comment on events
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Social BookMarks, Auto-post Events to Facebook
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Google Map Integration for Event Location 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export / Import events using ICAL
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create Group Events for multiple users
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Send invites to event participants
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Separate "Upcoming Events" widget to highlight future events. Customize widget icons to match with calendar colors to distinguish departments, resources [ etc]
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose from these strikingly attractive Themes - Red, Black, Blue, Wood Texture, Grey, Dark Green, Purple,Orange,3D Green, Maple, Rain
And a holiday-special Christmas Theme
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4 unique Event Views Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Daily, Weekly, List and Monthly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Upgrade JTAG Calendar without having to uninstall, thereby retaining the data of old events!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Calendar search that aggregates past and upcoming events for easier search results 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search results in interactive tool-tip for faster navigation 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Feature of Auto synchronize ICAL 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Restrict attendees.Only restricted number of users can attend event
Now you can show different calendars on different menu item by providing
calendar id while creating menu item.
Also you can show one master calendar which contins all the calendar.

All of these features encapsulated in an apple ICAL- like interface makes Jtag calendar one of the most intuitive and socially aware applications available for Joomla. 

Available in multiple languages - English, German, Spanish , French, Portuguese,Norwegian, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Catalan

New Jtag MiniCalendar Module which allow you to display monthly events in small calendar view
